name: Pet of the Week – Roosters
description: Did you know our county animal shelters have more than just dogs and cats looking for a new home? Right now at the Carlsbad and Bonita shelters, we also have many different roosters available for adoption!

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Did you know our county animal shelters have more than just dogs and cats looking for a new home? Right now at the Carlsbad and Bonita shelters, we also have many different roosters available for adoption! If you’re looking for a new feathered friend for you home, farm or ranch, please visit www.SDDAC.com for more details.
